author: nicks45589
title: Go-Peds Go-Cardano
description: Pour que la blockchain soit adoptée dans le monde entier, nous devons commencer à éduquer la prochaine génération dès maintenant. Mais comment faire en sorte que les enfants s'y intéressent ?

f6_assessments.q0: I LOVE go-peds. They are extremely fun and I remember riding them as a kid. I think its a really cool idea that they are incorporating them into a youth outreach program. I also think its a very smart decision to start with the younger generation. I think that is a smart approach as if they can get people interested at a young age, that is how they will make this thing have staying power. Seeing as its a cool and unique way to scale up Cardano community, I definitely think it addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: As already mentioned I LOVE go-peds. They are extremely fun and I remember riding them as a kid. I can definitely see this being enough of an incentive to get kids to want to keep coming back so that they can race and have fun. Other than the general idea, I think that this team has presented a detailed plan that fully describes what they plan to build and how they will do it. It gives me confidence that this could be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: I think this team did a great job with the auditability. The main things that I check for in assessing that is if they included KPIs and the KPIs are reasonable and make sense, a detailed roadmap, and a detailed budget that shows how all of the money will be spent for the different categories. This team covered all three of those areas so they get full points in this category.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea behind this proposal is very brilliant.It's clear that the best way to attract kids attention is with games. Kids love to play. So why not educate them why they are her? The proposer approach is to kill two birds with one stone - and it can work well.I think that the education of kids is one of the most important parts of any ecosystem. The cardano ecosystem will see huge value if kids are taught early about the cardono blockchain. This proposal has clearly identified a problem within the challenge. They have also provided the key metrics and goals that align with the challenge. My only concern is that the proposer didn't specify how this project will evolve. Will it be able to sustain itself, in which case some sort of monetisation has to take place, or will it just request funds from future challenges? These are areas that I think the proposer has to bring more information in.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal contains enough informations for me to have confidence in its success. To be fair, the proposer has not provided links to it's github or linkedin, but for his defense, I think that some of the skills required are not formal but experience based. The proposer stated that he can assemble the go-ped himself. I guess we have to take his words for it. On the other hand, they will have to hire professionals to build the website. Furthermore the proposer has specified the user acquisition technique they intend to use which adds a positive note on the feasibility of the project. The proposal also contains a detailed roadmap and reasonable milestones. The budget is broken down into identifiable items. I think that the website is a little bit expensive, but maybe the proposer can break it down further to show how he came up with that number. As a digital marketer myself, I know that building a simple website does not require all that money. Apart from that, I have confidence in the idea and the feasibility of this project's success.
f6_assessments.q2: I think that the proposal can be audited in the future, based on the details provided in this project. The proposer has managed to provide a roadmap that is pretty convincing. The milestones are also realistic in my opinion. The has also provided the metrics and KPIs needed for the community to audit the progress of the project. All in all the proposer has stated the problem in a precise and understandable way and the description of the solution is clear.

f6_assessments.q0: As a voter, I would be very eager to see not just a sample of the educational material shared with young people, but to see the whole experience in motion (since the proposal mentions that such events have already been executed).  Therefore, I recommend providing as much information of this type as possible, since without it and just by reading the proposal, the voter is left to struggle between the fascination of the idea and the possibility that the proposal will end up funding the personal motives of the proponents.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal makes a point:  the younger generations are the future users of the ecosystem.   The use of entertainment as a gateway to the active minds of young people is a fact that supports his thesis.  However, as I have mentioned before, I would like to have access to information about the events you have already developed.

Also. please attach links to external information of the team members.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal's KPIs are aligned with accessible measures of the proposal's progress.

f6_assessments.q0: Having children expose to Cardano ecosystem is promising and innovative. Children is the future of everything in the world. However I afraid that the exposing can cause harm to them because there are still many scam and cheating in the environment so it might be not safe for children, vulnerable people to join. The fact that they are in the Bay Area, in the heart of Silicon Valley is great since it's a appropiate place to experience new thing like this.
f6_assessments.q1: He's already successfully with organizing similar events for children in the area. The plan is well-thought, very detail and realistic. (He even can do the Go-Peds himselft and volunteer to do it with nơ charge). He also consider the allowance of parents, which liminate the risk that children can be harm. The proposal also shows his enthusiasm of his goal. He believes in the value of having children to join Catalyst community can affect the future. I think he's persuasive to try his best to bring the plan in to real life.
f6_assessments.q2: The planed timeline, KPIs and other measurement are on point: have quantity numbers, detail steps and even plan to scale-up project in the future ahead.

f6_assessments.q0: I think the teaching children about blockchain and Cardano is a promising project. I agree that this proposal addresses the challenge at the point to launch a new hub, however the target community makes me concerned. The proposal should select and inform the ages of children to make sure they are old enough to understand the concept of blockchain or Cardano. Or at least, I think we should consider it's very likely that only those parents who understand/ get involve in blockchain will let their kids go for some lessons about it.
f6_assessments.q1: I think this proposal is well informed readers with its development plan. I wonder how to establish a programme about blockchain and Cardano that understandable for kids, as well as, kids' contribution what value and to what extent of it, after they learn from the event? If the proposer could add this point, I think it would be better.
f6_assessments.q2: I think this is a creative proposal to create a new hub for scaling-up Cardano. However, the plan and the process should be added more key metrics/ KPIs about how kids engage in the blockchain/ Cardano, not only because of the go-peds race or having events with food & drink, but also they will learn something and take it to action.

solution: Créez une organisation pour les jeunes qui les captive avec les courses de go-ped tout en les éduquant sur la blockchain, la finance et Cardano.
experience: Nous sommes une équipe de passionnés de karting et de Cardano, qui travaillent avec des enfants depuis des années et qui construisent et font des courses de karting en tant que hobby.
